text: Philippe Honoré (; 25 November 1941 – 7 January 2015), known by the pen-name Honoré, was a French cartoonist.Philippe Honoré, on Larousse.fr. He was born in Vichy, France. Honoré worked with the newspaper company Charlie Hebdo during most of his career. He was a staff cartoonist there. Honoré died on January 7, 2015, during the January 2015 shooting attack on the Charlie Hebdo newspaper office. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2015 deaths Category:People from Allier Category:French cartoonists Category:Victims of the Charlie Hebdo shooting
title: Philippe Honoré
